name: QUICAL
description:
This game was made by a Japanese student alone! Developed to be a casual and casual Battle Royale.Since it is only single play, there is no trouble for teammates or rants in VC! (Team mode is also planned to be implemented) One game lasts less than 5 minutes, so you can feel free to play in the free time!

Want an alpha version key? Distributed on DIscord server! !


DIscord server
https://discord.gg/tQDkMtU

Developer Twitter
https://twitter.com/sakastudio_

We upload videos of this game every week(japanese only).
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0nc8pVk1TFE&list=PL-rWvrrJ1KvOi2HOKTL3bj2KDUVhgRR3l

Features

・ Easy battle royalties where one game ends in minutes
・ Exhilarating production
・ Loadout system that allows you to select the first weapon you can have when the game starts
・ Park system that can enhance players
・Minus park system that weakens players instead of increasing loadout points
